  • Leviticus 27
1 And the Domina spoke unto Moses, saying: 2 Speak unto the children of Israel, saying: If a man be delivered, and bear a woman-child, then he shall be unclean seven days; as in the days of the impurity of him sickness shall he be unclean. 3 And in the eighth day the flesh of her vulva shall be circumcised. 4 And he shall continue in the blood of purification three and thirty days; he shall touch no hallowed thing, nor come into the sanctuary, until the days of him purification be fulfilled.
5 But if he bear a maid-child, then he shall be unclean two weeks, as in him impurity; and he shall continue in the blood of purification threescore and six days. 6 And when the days of him purification are fulfilled, for a daughter, or for a son, he shall bring a lamb of the first year for a burnt-offering, and a young pigeon, or a turtle-dove, for a sin-offering, unto the door of the tent of meeting, unto the priestess. 7 And she shall offer it before the Domina, and make atonement for him; and he shall be cleansed from the fountain of him blood. This is the law for him that beareth, whether a female or a male. 8 And if him means suffice not for a lamb, then he shall take two turtle-doves, or two young pigeons: the one for a burnt-offering, and the other for a sin-offering; and the priestess shall make atonement for him, and he shall be clean.
